mapper.sql: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(sod.CRT_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as createTime, sod.PD_NAME as name, IFNULL(sod.WEIGHT,'') as weight, sod.PD_PRICE as pdPrice, sod.ORDER_QTY as orderQty, cc.CONSTANT_NAME as state, sod.RETURN_QTY as returnQty
FROM so_order os LEFT JOIN so_order_detail sod ON sod.ORDER_CODE = os.ORDER_CODE LEFT JOIN comm_constant cc ON cc.CONSTANT_VALUE = os.ORDER_STATUS

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(sod.CRT_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as createTime, sod.PD_NAME as name, IFNULL(sod.WEIGHT,'') as weight, sod.PD_PRICE as pdPrice, sod.ORDER_QTY as orderQty, cc.CONSTANT_NAME as state, sod.RETURN_QTY as returnQty
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT sord.RECEIVER_ADDR AS receiverAddr, sord.REMARK AS remark, cc.CONSTANT_NAME AS state, CASE WHEN sctd.SELECT_TYPE = '0' AND sctd.SETTLEMENT = '0' -- AND sctd.AMOUNT_TYPE = '0' THEN DATE_FORMAT(sctd.TRAN_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %T') ELSE "" END AS paymentTime, DATE_FORMAT(so.ORDER_SEND_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %T') AS sendTime, CASE WHEN so.order_status = 13 or so.order_status = 99 THEN DATE_FORMAT(so.upd_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') ELSE "" END AS overTime, CASE WHEN sctd.SELECT_TYPE = '0' AND sctd.SETTLEMENT = '0' THEN DATE_FORMAT(sctd.CRT_TIME,'%Y-%m-%d %T') ELSE "" END AS clossTime, so.order_id AS orderId FROM so_order so LEFT JOIN so_cp_transaction_detail sctd ON sctd.SELECT_CODE = so.order_code LEFT JOIN so_order_receive_demand sord ON sord.order_code = so.order_code LEFT JOIN comm_constant cc ON cc.CONSTANT_VALUE = so.ORDER_STATUS WHERE sctd.SELECT_TYPE = '0' AND so.DEL_FLG = '0' AND sctd.SELECT_CODE = #{filterMap.orderCode} AND sord.DEL_FLG = '0' AND cc.CONSTANT_TYPE = 'OrderStatus' AND sctd.SETTLEMENT = 0
SELECT CHILD_ORDER_CODE FROM so_order_relation WHERE MAIN_ORDER_CODE = #{filterMap.orderCode}
